title: SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_VISIBLE
content:
0x98215325A695E78A// SetMouseCursorVisible
void SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_VISIBLE(BOOL isVisible);Parameters:isVisible: If the mouse cursor is visibleToggles the visibility of the cursor. Do note that if the game loses focus and then regains it, the cursor will become visible again.Old name:  _SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_VISIBLE_IN_MENUSExamples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
    local menuType = "FE_MENU_VERSION_CORONA_LOBBY"
    ActivateFrontendMenu(GetHashKey(menuType), false, -1)
    --100 works as well
    Citizen.Wait(1000)
    --Hide frontend cursor
    SetMouseCursorVisible(false)
end)
